resources.string: To show relevant information in your area, allow access to your device’s location.
To show relevant information in your area, allow access to your device’s location. Tap on Settings > Permission, and turn Location on.
To easily receive and send photos, videos and other files, allow access to your device’s photos, media and files.
To send media, allow access to your device’s photos, media and files. Tap on Settings > Permission, and turn Storage on.
